org.jboss.windup.reporting.freemarker

Interface WindupFreeMarkerMethod

  • All Superinterfaces:
    freemarker.template.TemplateMethodModel, freemarker.template.TemplateMethodModelEx, freemarker.template.TemplateModel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGetPrettyPathForFile, EffortPointsToCssClass, FileModelToSourceReportModelMethod, FindFilesNotClassifiedOrHinted, FindSourceFilesByClassNameMethod, FormatRule, GenerateGUIDMethod, GetAllFreeMarkerDirectivesMethod, GetAllFreeMarkerMethodsMethod, GetAllRuleProviders, GetArchiveSHA1ToPathsMapperMethod, GetClassificationForFile, GetEffortCountForProjectByIssueCategoryMethod, GetEffortDescriptionForPoints, GetEffortDetailsForProjectTraversalMethod, GetEffortForFile, GetLogarithmicDistribution, GetNumberOfLibrariesMethod, GetPrettyPathForFile, GetPrettyPathForFileWithExtensions, GetProblemSummariesMethod, GetProjectTraversalMethod, GetRuleExecutionResults, GetTagModelByNameMethod, GetTagsFromFileClassificationsAndHints, GetTechnologyTagsForFile, GetTechnologyTagsForProject, GetTechReportPunchCardStatsMethod, GetWindupBrandNameMethod, GroupHintsByFile, IsFileADirectoryMethod, IsReportableFile, IsRulePhaseMethod, IsTagUnderTagMethod, IterableHasContent, IterableToListMethod, MapToJsonMethod, MarkdownToHtmlMethod, ProjectModelToApplicationIndexMethod, ProjectModelToOrganizationsMethod, ProjectModelToSha1, Sha1HexMethod, SortApplicationsListMethod, SortDependencyArchivesByPathMethod, SortDependencyGroupArchiveByPathMethod, SortFilesByPathMethod, SortProjectsByPathMethod, SortProjectTraversalsByPathMethod, SortTechUsageStatsMethod

    public interface WindupFreeMarkerMethod
extends freemarker.template.TemplateMethodModelEx
    This interface provides us with a way of looking up all TemplateMethodModel implementations within various windup-related addons. This makes it possible for windup-addons to provide extension methods that can be easily accessed by the Freemarker templates.
    Author:
    Jesse Sightler
